section.p: You can call this method to delete a cached music resource. To delete multiple music resources, call this method multiple times.
You can call this method to delete a cached music resource. To delete multiple music resources, call this method multiple times.
You can call this method to delete a cached music resource. To delete multiple resources, call this method multiple times.
You can call this method to delete a cached music resource. To delete multiple music resources, call this method multiple times.

plentry.pd: The ID of the music resource to be deleted.
The ID of the music resource to be deleted.
The ID of the music resource to be deleted.
The code of the music resource to be deleted.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
0: Success. The music resource is deleted.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Method call failed. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: 0: Success. The music resource has been deleted.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
